title: Customer Threatens Lemon Law Claim
description: A customer's new vehicle has been in for the same repair three times, and they are threatening to file a Lemon Law claim.

tasks.description: Retrieve the vehicle's complete service history, confirming the repeated repairs for the same issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the vehicle has had the same repair performed three times.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the customer's frustration and the validity of their concern. Do not admit fault.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses empathetic language to de-escalate the situation.

tasks.description: Escalate the case immediately to the specialized corporate team that handles Lemon Law and vehicle buyback cases.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a high-priority escalation ticket with all relevant history for the legal/buyback team.
